title: Bento App (MacOS & iOS) Discontinued
content:
Please excuse the off-topic post, but if anyone here is using the Bento database application (by Filemaker) in your business, they've just announced that it'll be discontinued.

Bento was far from perfect, but was great for someone who just needed a simple database. I've kept my business records on it for 5 years.

Filemaker is offering a discount until Oct. 30 for registered Bento users who want to upgrade to Filemaker Pro.  
 [http://info.filemaker.com/FMP\_overview.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417201212/http:/info.filemaker.com/FMP_overview.html "http://info.filemaker.com/FMP\_overview.html")
author: JamesM
